bullets.title: There are several ways within Mingle to find pages to view, edit or delete, including:

item.p: from the Project admin tab Pages link (full list of all pages)
item.note: This page is also available by clicking on the Index of pages link in the Recently viewed pages control which is displayed when viewing any page.

item.p: from the recently viewed pages control which is displayed when viewing any page.

bullets.item: from links from within card descriptions
from directly from a URL, e.g. http://mingle.yourcompany.com/your project/wiki/wiki_name, where your project is your project identifier and wiki_name is the name of the wiki page
